title: Computer Crashes On Updating League Client
body:
Speaking for a friend, he hasn't played league in a long time but recently updated to Windows 10. He tried to update league, but every time he opens up the client his entire computer freezes without an error and automatically restarts the computer.

Things he has done

* He tried uninstalling league of legends and he also experiences the same freezing and restarting.
* He tried re-downloading the installer, still crashes
* He tried Scanned computer/CCleaner
* He tried updating drivers (Graphics Card) still nothing

He said this problem only occurs when launching league of legends and any other application/game is fine, and that also before the windows 10 update, league of legends runs perfectly fine.

My friend did not want to send a support ticket, but I still want to help him. Any ideas/fix we can try?

replies.body: We're currently looking into reports about the recent Windows 10 update possibly having issues with the client.  In the meantime,[ rolling back the update ](http://www.howtogeek.com/235474/how-to-roll-back-builds-and-uninstall-updates-on-windows-10/)might restore accessibility to open the client back up.  Hopefully, this can get your friend fixed up while we find out more!
Yeah I have the same issue I sent a ticket to riot with no response so far. It's the latest WINDOWS 10 UPDATE it screws over your league.
